select.if: SELECT T.ID AS "id",'-1' AS "pId",T.ORGNAME AS "name", T.CODE AS "code",T.ORGLEVEL AS "orgLevel",'true' as "isParent" FROM PORTAL.APDP_ORG T WHERE T.ORGLEVEL = '1'
SELECT T.ID AS "id",T.PARENT_ID AS "pId",T.ORGNAME AS "name", T.CODE AS "code",T.ORGLEVEL AS "orgLevel",'true' as "isParent" FROM PORTAL.APDP_ORG T WHERE T.PARENT_ID = #{orgId}
SELECT T.ID AS "id",T.PARENT_ID AS "pId",T.ORGNAME AS "name", T.CODE AS "code",T.ORGLEVEL AS "orgLevel",'false' as "isParent" FROM PORTAL.APDP_ORG T WHERE T.PARENT_ID = #{orgId}

mapper.select: SELECT T.GROUP_ID_2 CITY_ID,T.GROUP_ID_2_NAME CITY_NAME, T.TOWN_ID ID,T.TOWN_NAME FROM PCDE.TB_CDE_TOWN_CODE T WHERE T.GROUP_ID_2=#{city_id}

SELECT T.UNIT_ID, T.UNIT_NAME, T2.ID FROM PCDE.TAB_CDE_GROUP_CODE T, PORTAL.APDP_ORG T2 WHERE T.UNIT_ID = T2.CODE AND T.GROUP_ID_1 = #{group_id_1} AND T.IS_DEFAULT = 0
AND T.UNIT_NAME LIKE #{unit_name}
mapper.update: UPDATE PORTAL.APDP_ORG T SET T.PARENT_ID = #{orgId} WHERE T.CODE = #{group_id_4}
mapper.select: SELECT T.GROUP_ID_1_NAME,T.UNIT_NAME,T.GROUP_ID_4_NAME,T.HQ_CHAN_CODE,T3.CHN_CDE_1_NAME, T3.CHN_CDE_2_NAME,T3.CHN_CDE_3_NAME,T3.CHN_CDE_4_NAME,T3.LOG_NO,T3.LAT_NO, DECODE(T3.STATUS,'00','草稿','01','待审核','10','正常','11','清算','12','终止','') AS STATUS, T3.HQ_PAY_CHNL_ID,T3.PAY_CHNL_NAME,DECODE(T3.IS_INPUT_SYSTEM, '1', '是', '否') AS IS_INPUT_SYSTEM, T3.SYSTEM_NUM,DECODE(T3.IS_SIGN, '1', '是', '否') AS IS_SIGN, DECODE(t3.IS_DEVELOPER,'1','是','否') AS IS_DEVELOPER, DECODE(T3.IS_MINI_HALL, '1', '是', '否') AS IS_MINI_HALL,T2.NAME,T2.PHONE FROM PCDE.TAB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE T, PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_MOB_PERSON T2, PCDE.TB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE T3 WHERE T.GROUP_ID_4 = T2.GROUP_ID_CODE AND T.GROUP_ID_4 = T3.GROUP_ID_4 AND T2.LEV = 2 AND T.GROUP_ID_4 = #{group_id_4} AND T2.DEAL_DATE=to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm')

SELECT T.HQ_CHAN_CODE,T.GROUP_ID_4_NAME,T.GROUP_ID_1_NAME,T0.UNIT_NAME,T.CHN_CDE_1_NAME, T.CHN_CDE_2_NAME,T.CHN_CDE_3_NAME,T.CHN_CDE_4_NAME,T.CONTACT_NAME,T.CONTACT_PHONE, T.CON_OFFICE_PHONE,T.LOG_NO,T.LAT_NO,T.CHNL_ADDR, T0.CHNL_TYPE,T0.CITY_NAME,T0.TOWN_NAME, DECODE(T.STATUS,'00','草稿','01','待审核','10','正常','11','清算','12','终止','') AS STATUS, DECODE(T.IS_MINI_HALL, '1', '是', '0', '否', '') AS IS_MINI_HALL, TO_CHAR(T.CREATE_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mi:ss') AS CREATE_TIME, T.HALL_AREA_SIZE,DECODE(T.CHAIN_FLAG, '1', '是', '否') AS CHAIN_FLAG, T.BUS_AREA_SIZE,T.IMGFORNT,T.IMGMIDDLE,T.IMGLATER, T1.NAME,T1.ACCOUNT,T1.PHONE, CASE WHEN T0.IS_JK ='0' THEN '公众渠道' ELSE '集客渠道' END IS_JK, T0.START_SHORT_NAME,T0.START_LEVE FROM PCDE.TB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE T LEFT JOIN PCDE.TAB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE T0 ON (T0.FD_CHNL_CODE = T.FD_CHNL_CODE) LEFT JOIN PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_MOB_PERSON T1 ON (T.GROUP_ID_4 = T1.GROUP_ID_CODE) WHERE T.GROUP_ID_4 = #{group_id_4} AND T1.DEAL_DATE=to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm')
SELECT * FROM PCDE.TB_CDE_TOWN_CODE WHERE TOWN_NAME=#{town_name} AND GROUP_ID_2=#{city_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PCDE.TB_CDE_TYPE( ID, TYPE_NAME ) SELECT PCDE.CH_TYPE_ID.NEXTVAL ,#{type_name} FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO PCDE.TB_CDE_TOWN_CODE( GROUP_ID_0_NAME, GROUP_ID_1_NAME, GROUP_ID_2_NAME, TOWN_NAME, GROUP_ID_0, GROUP_ID_1, GROUP_ID_2, TOWN_ID ) SELECT '云南省',#{group_id_1_name},#{city_name},#{town_name},'86000', #{group_id_1},#{city_id},'T'||PCDE.town_id.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.update: UPDATE PCDE.TAB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE SET IS_MARK='1' WHERE HQ_CHAN_CODE=#{hq_chan_code}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT GROUP_ID_1_NAME, GROUP_ID_2_NAME CITY_NAME, GROUP_ID_1, GROUP_ID_2 CITY_ID FROM PCDE.TB_CDE_TOWN_CODE WHERE GROUP_ID_1 IN(SELECT GROUP_ID_1 FROM PCDE.TAB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE WHERE HQ_CHAN_CODE=#{hq_chan_code})
mapper.update: UPDATE PCDE.TB_CDE_TYPE SET TYPE_NAME=#{type_name} WHERE ID=#{id}
UPDATE PCDE.TAB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE T SET T.CHNL_TYPE=#{type_name} WHERE T.CHNL_ID=#{id}
UPDATE PCDE.TB_CDE_TOWN_CODE SET TOWN_NAME=#{town_name} WHERE TOWN_ID=#{id}
UPDATE PCDE.TAB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE T SET T.TOWN_NAME=#{town_name} WHERE T.TOWN_ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT HQ_CHAN_CODE FROM PCDE.TB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE T WHERE T.HQ_CHAN_CODE=#{hq_chan_code} AND T.CHN_CDE_3_NAME LIKE '%代理点%'

select.if: SELECT * FROM PCDE.TAB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE WHERE HQ_CHAN_CODE=#{hq_chan_code} AND (CHNL_ID IS NULL OR CITY_ID IS NULL OR TOWN_ID IS NULL)
SELECT * FROM PCDE.TAB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE WHERE HQ_CHAN_CODE=#{hq_chan_code} AND (CITY_ID IS NULL OR TOWN_ID IS NULL)

mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PCDE.TAB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE T WHERE T.IS_MARK='0' AND T.IS_SIGN = 1 AND T.GROUP_ID_1 !=16017
AND T.GROUP_ID_1 = #{orgCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE PCDE.TAB_CDE_CHANL_HQ_CODE SET IS_MULT=#{type} WHERE HQ_CHAN_CODE=#{hq_chan_code}
